text: "Waterloo Sunset" is a 1967 song by British band The Kinks and was taken from their fifth studio album Something Else by The Kinks. It topped the single charts in the Netherlands and made the top 10 in Europe, Australia and New Zealand. It failed to chart in North America. It was covered by Cathy Dennis in 1997. == References == Category:1967 songs Category:1960s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Psychedelic pop songs Category:The Kinks songs Category:Cathy Dennis songs Category:Def Leppard songs Category:The Jam songs Category:David Bowie songs
title: Waterloo Sunset
